summary.span: 对一组关键帧中具有 的属性的值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property that takes a along a set of key frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过定义关键帧动画的目标值及其属性，其中包含一系列对象。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每个定义的具有其自己的目标动画段和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 动画运行时，它继续处理从一个密钥值在指定的下一个键次。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三种类型的类，一个用于每个受支持的内插方法： ， ，和。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 与不同、可以有多个目标值。Unlike a , a can have more than two target values. 您还可以控制个人的内插方法段。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，该值由 的实例确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前实例确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个在组合链中，此值将是快照值 （如果可用） 或基属性值; 否则此值将使用链中前一个动画返回的值这不是已停止。If `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not stopped. `defaultDestinationValue`是基本的值，如果动画位于第一个动画组合层中的属性; 否则，值为从上一个动画组合层中的属性输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise, the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果在动画重复时累计其值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when it repeats; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，该动画的输出值累积仅当该动画的属性使其重复其简单持续时间。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values accumulate only when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不会不会累计其值，重新启动时，因为其父级重复出现，或从其时钟重启，因此调用。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts, because its parent repeated, or because its clock was restarted from a call.
